scriptLines.text: You didn't expect to come across anyone this deep into the forest, but your eyes spot a female form... but, as the light passes through it, you realize that there's no way the thing before you is human.
You approach cautiously - "she" isn't facing you.  Once you get closer, you try to discern more details.

"She" has a rather sizable rear - one that you could get lost in, quite literally, as she appears to be made of... slime. Though you suppose she can take any shape, which makes her current one quite suspect.
Before you can inspect further, she turns to face you, and, seeing you, jiggles excitedly. Her "breasts" are massive, far larger than any human woman would have, and they move quite... fluidly.
"Ooooooo... a human!  What brings you to my haunt?" she asks, although as soon as she starts to approach... slithering across the ground, you reach for your weapon.
"What... are you?" you ask, confused.
"That's a rather rude question, isn't it?", she says, "I'm a slime, obviously.  A sentient slime."
Obviously.
"How are you... speaking?" you ask.

"Oh... well, that's a rather embarrassing question..." she says, looking flustered, although she's still a translucent blue.  "As a non-sentient slime... consumes... sentient creatures, it starts to develop a mind of its own... that's me!"
You pick up your guard.  "And am I next, then?" you say, accusingly.

"No! I haven't digested many humans since I became, well, me.  Always in self-defense, of course," she adds, looking somewhat sullen. "Sentient slime goo is an expensive commodity, or so I've come to learn. So I do have to fend off the occasional poacher", she explains.
"Then why are you shaped like... that?" you ask.
"Because I'm a girl slime, of course," she says, matter-of-factly.
"No, I mean... why like... -that-, in particular?"
"Oh! You mean my luscious curves. You'll have to forgive me, I can be pretty... bubbly," she says, jiggling her... entire form. Though she says that, she seems surprisingly sharp.
"Yes, why?  Are you trying to entice men to their dooms?", you ask, accusingly.
"Why? Are you enticed?" she asks, wiggling her... "hips".
She sees that you're not amused by her response, and sighs.

"I just prefer this form.  It keeps me... grounded," she says, shrugging, "I have no interest in eating you, or, mmhm, engaging in other primal behaviors. We don't reproduce that way, you see," she says, patting the flat goo where her vagina would be.
"How... do you reproduce?"
"My, what a personal question. Love darts, since you asked," she says, looking proud of herself.
You look at her confused.
"Mmm, don't ask," she says, and you decide to drop that line of inquiry.
"And if I were to... want to... that would be my problem, then?" you ask, hand still on your weapon.

"It wouldn't be a problem at all. You wouldn't be the first. Oh, but you think I ate them, don't you? No, not one. Some gave me gifts... others, I was just pleased to have the company.  It doesn't do anything for me, but it doesn't hurt me either. I flow like water," she says, smiling.
What will you do?  Fight, fuck, or flee?
You defeat the slime, and she becomes visibly agitated - like she can't hold onto her form any longer.
"I suppose you want to claim a trophy, don't you?  Well then, stab my core," she says, defeated.
"Your core?"

"It's the only way to kill a slime.  Chopping us up to pieces does nothing; we'll just reform. If you destroy this, we're gone for good," she says, pointing to a jewel floating within her gelatinous form.
"Why are you telling me this?"
"You'd find out anyway," she explains, sloshing a bit as she struggles to keep her voluptuous form, "and I would rather have it done quickly than... the alternative."
Do you stab her core?
You attempt to destroy her core with a finishing blow!

You successfully shatter the slime's core. In her last moments, she looks at you with... sadness, and then, her form is completely lost - the slime that was once her spreads out due solely to the force of gravity, and begins to denature and dim.
You slew the slime! You receive some worthless goo.

You fail to shatter the slime's core - her slime hardens in such a way to deflect the blow, and then she lurches towards you, so that your wrist gets sucked inside of her. In the next few terrifying moments, she pulls the whole of you into herself.
"You're quite violent, aren't you?  Well, I won't turn down such a generously offered meal.  Hopefully you go to my chest or hips and not my belly," she says, ominously.
You feel a wave of pressure within her, as if her slime was somehow changing in texture... and then your entire body becomes numb.

"I'm sorry, but I can't just let you kill me. I've done nothing wrong. You, on the contrary... you are dangerous," she says, but you can't say anything in response, her goo filling your mouth as you open it to scream.
With a sudden existential terror, you realize what's happening.  She's digesting you. You struggle to move, even a little bit, but... nothing.  You're immobile within the slime.

"Don't worry, you'll just dissolve away.  I don't poop.  Oh, that's so embarassing to say.  Pretend you didn't hear it. Or, you know, disappear forever..." she says, and in a matter of a few seconds, you'll obey - and end your journey as an extra inch on the slime's impressive hips.

Her round, full "belly" jiggles with its contents, as she sloshes away to continue whatever it is she was doing before you attacked her and tried to destroy her. She seems to rather enjoy it - you, on the other hand, can slowly feel your consciousness slipping away, knowing that once it goes dark, she's definitely going to make you her meal.
And, indeed, you slip into unconsciousness, and she goes about her day, her ballooned slime-belly gurgling, until nothing remains.
Bad End.
You put away your weapon. This slime is no danger to anyone who isn't already a danger to others themselves.  You turn away, but the slime stops you.

"Thank you for understanding. Please, have some slime," she says, and though you think to reject her... generous offer, she dumps about a pound of pristine goop into your hand.  You wrap it in some rags, and store it carefully in your bag.
You nod to the slime, and begin to leave again.
"It won't spoil, not as long as I'm alive. Do with it what you will," she says, calling after you.  You receive some slime goo. You spared the slime!
The slime defeats you, and you feel a great sense of unease.
"Perfect.  I needed some 'me' time," she says, getting ready to do... something.
"What do you mean?" you ask, worried.
"I need to rejuvenate, and I need somewhere hot and dark for that," she says, and you have a dark premonition. "Open wide!" she demands.
You open your mouth to speak... a costly mistake!
You see the slime girl's face up close, and then, a moment later, it collides with yours - and your stomach is instantly full of slime girl goo, with pints being piped in by the second.

In a matter of minutes, your stomach is pumped full near to bursting, and little of the mischevious slime girl is to be found spread on the ground around you - most of her being is swirling and rushing through your intestines, sitting heavily in your over-inflated belly.
You can't even stand, being that overburdened... so you sit there, for hours, with the googirl cramping your bowels.
You are stuck for a long while.  You eat 10 food. You recover 15 health.
You receive 2 Experience for the... experience.
You successfully flee, leaving the slow-moving slime behind you.
You turn to flee, but trip, your pants falling down!
"Don't mind if I do!" you hear the slimegirl say from behind you... and then, you hear her glorpy form ascend into the air... and a moment later, what goes up comes down, and hard.
The sudden rush into your bowels knocks the wind out of you, and the pumping continues, as she anchors her gooey form to the ground and pumps herself, "face"-first into your poor, unfortunate guts.

You can't even stand, being that overburdened... so you sit there, for hours, with the googirl cramping your bowels.
You are stuck for a long while.  You eat 10 food. You recover 15 health.
You receive 2 Experience for the... experience.
You approach the slime tentatively, wary of her amorphous goop.  She smirks at you.
"My name is Protea, if you're curious," she says, her hands tracing along her hips and down to her thighs, "but you can call me Tea."
"Hi... Tea," you say, feeling weird about addressing a sentient slime in such a casual way. "I'm <NAME>. Are you sure you're not going to eat me?"

She jiggles again. "No way. I like cute humans like you.  And it seems like... we're not going to have any problems getting along, are we?" she asks, sloshing towards you until you can hear... well, not her breathing, but something.

You reach out and touch her chest - your fingers sink in, but just barely, and there's a surprising amount of give.  You get the sense that she's intentionally keeping her form so that it feels how you expect it to feel.  To your relief, she doesn't suck you in.
"Mmmm... and do you want to come into me or... would you like me to fashion you up a male-human surrogate?  You wouldn't be the first to ask for that, either," she says, flatly.
What do you do?
"I-I'd like to... come inside," you say, meekly.
"Mmm... okay. I'll let you in me. You're going to have to fight your way in, though~ <3" she says, bringing her curvy, squishy body to yours.
She begins to disrobe you, and while you're wary of her, she doesn't seem to be threatening.
"I don't actually have membranous parts like you do," she says, reaching between her "legs", "since I'm ALL membrane... but I think you'll like what I do have to offer."

She leaves a trail of slime on the underside of your penis with her slimy finger, then reclines into her own slime, spreading her "legs" as she does, wide, to reveal her featureless, but round and smooth mound.

"Come and get it," she says, bringing her hands up to her chest... and her slime-created appendages to her thighs, to properly frame where she wants you to insert it. You're ushered forward by a wave of slime, and you press the tip to her... well, to her nothing, but its sticky and has a little give none-the-less. "That's right... force it in..."

She speaks sultrily, hungrily, even... but you wonder exactly what it is she gets out of this. You push your hips forward, and it just barely begins to sink into her, where her thick thighs meet, and you feel an exquisite pressure on the tip of your penis.

"Ooooh... it's coming inside me... you might not get it back," she says, and you feel an insistent little tug on the end - by now, the head has been subsumed, and you panic, trying to pull it out - but it's stuck, and the slime building up around your hips is forcing you forward still.

You begin sinking the shaft into where her vagina would be - it's a heavenly sensation, her thick slime wrapping around your dick, with its own internal warmth, a strong feeling of suction, and even a slight vibration.  Still, you try to pull away.  "W-wait!" you cry out.

"I told you... I'm not going to eat you. I just want it all inside... besides, if I want to keep it, you've got no choice, now," she says, tauntingly. She's absolutely right; there's no way you can pull it free, as she's got a vice-like grip around it where she's pulling you in.

Finally, she's pulled in as much as can be pulled in, and you worry that she'll suck the whole of your body in, but your hips tap against her spread "thighs" and come to a stop, and you feel a buzzing in your head as your entire cock is being wrapped and massaged by her tight innards.

I can't say if it's the same sensation, but... does that really matter?" she asks, as she begins to slide herself to and fro, spreading her legs wide while you're sucked in and out of her, tightly, like... well, like you're fucking gelatin. The sound is an unmistakable "schlorp schlorp" that doesn't sound anything like ordinary sex.

Her large breasts sway, similarly, like gelatin, and she bites her finger coquettishly - although the effect is somewhat subverted by the fact that the tip of her "finger" ends up a prolonged taffy goop between her "lips" and what remains of her "finger".

Nevertheless, It isn't long before you're nearing the edge, and as you try to resist, the slime tightens, and she throws her arms around you, kissing you on the face, and it's like getting hit in the face with a gooey creampie. Speaking of gooey creampies, she immediately thereafter receives one inside of her.

You explode in spurts, and she smiles broadly - quite broadly, more broadly than any human ever possibly could. "How early! Aren't you a dear," she says, while you're still in the throes of it, spurting off thick, visible globs of white jelly inside her light blue jelly.

With a few punctual thrusts, your legs fail, but she catches you in her goo, so that you're laying on her like a slimy bed, her "legs" wrapped around you.  Your own semen seems to have been caught in some kind of airpocket, swishing about somewhere near where her womb would be.

"Very good... but since it was so quick, I'm sure you'll want to go again," she says, chiding you while wrapping her arms around you. You expect to sink into her gooey form, but thankfully, you remain resting on top.

Several minutes pass before you're ready to go again, during which her soft, feminine curves have all but melted - aside from the chest up, which is still voluptuous, she's just a formless... slime. She smirks at you.
"Want to try anal?" she asks, and you boggle - how would that be any different? She twists under you, so that she's facing away.
You watch as she starts to reform, her slime squicking and squelching as it resumes the shape of a... very shapely woman.

"Unfortunately, I don't have an excretory hole for you to misuse," she says, as her large rear forms itself out of the nearly flat prism of slime, "but I think I can do one better," she says, sticking out said rear at you, and slowly forming a hole where one would be appropriate... but it's a hole that is quite literal, and perfectly circular, or, to be more accurate, cylindrical.
"Umm... do you want me to just... stick it in there?" you ask, uncertain.

"Of course. Jam it in my excretory hole," she demands, narrowing and enlarging the hole rhythmically in a seeming attempt to entice you, "I promise, this will be very embarrassing and innappropriate for me," she goes on, unconvincingly.

Still, it's tempting. You wade closer, and stick your hardening member where she clearly wants you to stick it - immediately, she contracts all of the slime so that you're fully engulfed, and it's incredibly tight. You nearly lose it inside immediately.
"Oh! My butt! Not my butt... now I'll never be a Queen!" she says, and you wonder what exactly it is she's talking about. "Mmmm... how woefully non-standard!"
She wiggles her fat rear back at you so that it wobbles and jiggles and sloshes about, and you have to double down on your efforts to not explode inside what isn't actually her asshole.

"Oh my. I'm going to have such difficulty expelling waste properly in the near-future," she says, reaching back to slap her slimy, fat rear for emphasis, "You're really doing a number on my non-reproductive chute."

As you squelch in and out, and she loosens and tightens her grip on you, you quickly build to another finish - shooting a fat load into her fat ass, where, again, it pools somewhere around where her ileocecal valve would be.
You collapse backwards this time, again caught by her slime. You can see the ball of cum join the other to form an even larger, greasy pool within her.
"What are you planning to do with that?" you ask her, curious.
She thinks for a moment. "I play little games with it... I can preserve it for a long time, so I can use it for... rather mischevious purposes, particularly for humans and villages that annoy me."
She pauses to remember one such incident. You can't imagine what she means.

She smiles, remembering something. "I once had a woman who visited me instead of her poor, unsuspecting husband - lucky for me, her brother was often a frequent contributor.  She had three kids by him before I told her."
Your eyes open wide. She giggles, and rears up, towering over you.
"But for now... I'll let you keep yours..." she says, before her massive rear crashes down around your face.
You worry that you're going to drown, but somehow, you can breathe through the jelly. Worrisome, though, is the sensation that your mouth is being pried open, and something is flowing down into it.

"I think I was quite generous in entertaining you, now I want you to entertain me... by swallowing your own goo," she says, the amusement already plain on her... face, which, because she's transparent, you can see clear through her body, no matter how large her ass is.
It flows into your mouth and down your throat - unquestionably, it's the semen that you filled her with.  You gulp down your own bitter ball-juice. You win some, you lose some.
Tea thanks you for a good time, and you stumble away, nauseous, perhaps to find something to clean the taste out of your mouth.
You got banged by the slime!
"I... um..." you say, but the words won't come out.

"Mmmm... interesting. I kind of suspected; you get a knack for telling that when you're a slime as long as I've been," she says, and you see the slime in her nether regions, being what they are, starting to bulge out and harden.

You stare at her in awe - if her preferences in regards to hips and bust are any indication, she has no problems exaggerating the human form.  Sure enough, the slimy bulge is nearly as thick as a fist and as long as elbow to wrist, and it's still forming and hardening.

"I assume that's where you want it. On me, that is. I know where you want it in the more... personal sense. I've had my slime in similar places before, after all," she says, putting the finishing touches on her slimy phallus-like protrusion. "Now... turn around, love."

You turn, and are quickly shoved forward by a wall of slime - but rather than falling face first into the dirt, you fall face-first into a pile of goo that catches you quite gently. Unfortunately, Tea doesn't have much more gentleness in mind.
"Mmm, yes... there it is. That's where you like to feel good, isn't it, you little pervert? Not that I mind. Now, I'm coming inside... so start fantasizing...

All at once, a large amount of slime, hardened, but still flexible, forces its way up into you, and you hold your breath. It seems to reach almost impossibly deep, and you feel your stomach distend as it pushes it out from behind.
Tea pumps away at your hole, forcing you to ejaculate into her slime without reserve.
She milks it out of you into her slime over and over again, and you pump a few good loads worth into an increasingly large orb of goo.

That isn't the end of it, however. Once she's done, she pulls her slime penis out of you, leaving a decent amount of it inside - but she quickly reforms it as she slides over herself to reach your mouth with it.
She pumps your mouth until, finally, you can see your own cum rushing up through the pillar of slime that is her slime-dong, and she shoots a slimy, but entirely human, load down your throat.

Tea thanks you for a good time, and you stumble away, nauseous, perhaps to find something to clean the taste out of your mouth.
